Package ca.team4308.absolutelib.subsystems

Class Arm.Joint

java.lang.Object
ca.team4308.absolutelib.subsystems.Arm.Joint
Enclosing class:
Arm
public static class Arm.Joint extends Object
A single rotary joint in the arm, with PID, feedforward, and output filtering.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Arm.Joint.Mode
    Operating mode for a joint.
    static interface 
    Arm.Joint.OutputFilter
    Functional interface for filtering joint output.

  • Constructor Details

    • Joint

      public Joint(MotorWrapper motor, MotorWrapper.MotorConfig motorConfig, EncoderWrapper encoder, Arm.JointConfig config, double initialAngleRad)
      Creates a new joint.
      Parameters:
      motor - motor driving this joint
      motorConfig - motor configuration to apply (may be null)
      encoder - encoder measuring joint angle
      config - joint configuration (limits, tolerance, etc.)
      initialAngleRad - initial angle in radians

      Parameters:
      minPercent - minimum output percent
      maxPercent - maximum output percent

      public void setManualPercent(double pct)
      Sets the joint to manual mode with the given output percent.
      Parameters:
      pct - output percent in [-1, 1]

    • computeOutputPercent

      protected double computeOutputPercent(Arm.Joint.Mode mode, double target, double current)
      Single overridable computation for arm output including PID, FF, augmentors, and clamping.
      Parameters:
      mode - current joint operating mode
      target - target angle in radians
      current - current angle in radians
      Returns:
      output percent in [-1, 1]

    • computePositionOutput

      @Deprecated protected double computePositionOutput(double target, double current)
      Deprecated.
      Use computeOutputPercent(Mode, double, double) instead.
      Parameters:
      target - target angle in radians
      current - current angle in radians
      Returns:
      output percent

      current - current angle in radians
      Returns:
      augmented output percent

      kI - integral gain
      kD - derivative gain

      public void setFeedforwardGains(double kS, double kCos, double kV, double kA)
      Sets the arm feedforward gains.
      Parameters:
      kS - static gain
      kCos - cosine (gravity) gain
      kV - velocity gain
      kA - acceleration gain

      currentRad - current angle in radians

      Runs the output through all registered filters.
      Parameters:
      targetRad - target angle in radians
      currentRad - current angle in radians
      proposedPercent - the output percent before filtering
      Returns:
      filtered output percent
